buckle.description: The value of the base pair buckle parameter.

hbond_type_12.description: Base pair classification of Westhoff and Leontis.

i_PDB_ins_code.description:
Describes the PDB insertion code of the i-th base in the base pair.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.pdbx_PDB_ins_code in the
ATOM_SITE category.

i_auth_asym_id.description:
Describes the asym id of the i-th base in the base pair.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.auth_asym_id in the
ATOM_SITE category.

ATOM_SITE category.

Describes the symmetry operation that should be applied to the
 coordinates of the i-th base to generate the first partner 
 in the base pair.

rise.description: The value of the base pair step rise parameter.

roll.description: The value of the base pair step roll parameter.

shift.description: The value of the base pair step shift parameter.

slide.description: The value of the base pair step slide parameter.

tip.description: The value of the base pair step twist parameter.

twist.description: The value of the base pair step twist parameter.

x_displacement.description: The value of the base pair step X displacement parameter.

y_displacement.description: The value of the base pair step Y displacement parameter.

 ATOM_SITE category.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.pdbx_PDB_model_num in the
ATOM_SITE category.

 each item in the PDBX_STRUCT_SPECIAL_SYMMETRY list.

 This is an integer serial number.

Part of the identifier for the molecular component.

 ATOM_SITE category.

PDB_model_num.description:
pdbx_vrpt_model_list identifier. Normally an integer but can be a string of up to 10 characters 
If the structure does not have multiple models then PDB_model_num will be "1".
Example:

absolute_RSRZ_percentile.description: Either a decimal number or the string "NotAvailable".

absolute_ramachandran_percentile.description:
The "all" percentile rank for the property percent_ramachandran_outliers for the chain/model 
(the MolProbity Ramachandran outlier score).
The comparison will be to:
* For X-ray structures: the set of all structures determined by X-ray crystallography ...
* For NMR and EM structures: the set of all PDB structures
... deposited, up to the date included in the pdbx_vrpt_software version,
where the percent_ramachandran_outliers was successfully calculated.
Example:            N.B. this is the chain/model equivalent of the overall (all chain) category "absolute-percentile-percent-rama-outliers"
Produced by the percentiles step of the validation pipeline software.

absolute_sidechain_percentile.description:
The "all" percentile score for the chain/model based on the percentage of sidechain outliers for the chain/model.
(the MolProbity sidechain outlier score).
The comparison will be to:
* For X-ray structures: the set of all structures determined by X-ray crystallography ...
* For NMR and EM structures: the set of all PDB structures 
... deposited, up to the date included in the pdbx_vrpt_software version, 
where the percent_rotamer_outliers was successfully calculated.
Example:              
Only calculated if percent_rotamer_outliers is available.
N.B. this is the chain/model equivalent of the overall (all chain) category "absolute-percentile-percent-rota-outliers"
Produced by the percentiles step of the validation pipeline software.

angles_RMSZ.description:
The overall root mean square of the Z-score for deviations of bond angles in comparison to 
"standard geometry" made using the MolProbity dangle program.
Standard geometry parameters are taken from Engh and Huber (2001) and Parkinson et al. (1996).
This value is for all chains in the structure.

auth_asym_id.description:
The auth_asym_id identifier for the residue or auth_asym_id obtained from cif item _atom_site.auth_asym_id.
Currently this is limited to 5 characters. 
Example:

bonds_RMSZ.description:
The overall root mean square of the Z-score for deviations of bond lengths in comparison to 
"standard geometry" made using the MolProbity dangle program.
Standard geometry parameters are taken from Engh and Huber (2001) and Parkinson et al. (1996).
This value is for all chains in the structure.

entity_id.description:
The entity id for the residue or chain. This is from item _atom_site.label_entity_id that is a pointer to _entity.id in the ENTITY category. 
Example:

label_asym_id.description:
The_atom_site.label_asym_id label for the residue.  Normally this is the same as the chain.
Example:

num_angles_RMSZ.description:
The number of bond angless compared to "standard geometry" made using the MolProbity dangle program.
Standard geometry parameters are taken from Engh and Huber (2001) and Parkinson et al. (1996).
This value is for all chains in the structure.

num_bonds_RMSZ.description:
The number of bond lengths compared to "standard geometry" made using the MolProbity dangle program.
Standard geometry parameters are taken from Engh and Huber (2001) and Parkinson et al. (1996).
This value is for all chains in the structure.

ordinal.description: Uniquely identifies each instance of this category.

relative_RSRZ_percentile.description: Either a decimal number or the string "NotAvailable".

relative_ramachandran_percentile.description:
The "relative" percentile rank for the property percent_ramachandran_outliers for the chain/model
(the MolProbity Ramachandran outlier score).
The comparison will be to:
* For X-ray structures: the subset of structures structures determined by X-ray crystallography,
  that have a similar resolution ("PDB-resolution") to this entry, ...
* For structures determined by NMR: the subset of structures determined by NMR ...  
* For structures determined by EM: the subset of structures determined by EM ...  
... deposited up to the date included in the pdbx_vrpt_software version and
where the percent_ramachandran_outliers was successfully calculated.
Example:            N.B. this is the chain/model equivalent of the overall (all chain) category "relative-percentile-percent-rama-outliers"
Produced by the percentiles step of the validation pipeline software.

relative_sidechain_percentile.description:
The "relative" percentile rank for the property percent_rotamer_outliers for this chain/model.
(the MolProbity sidechain outlier score).
The comparison will be to:
* For X-ray structures: the subset of structures structures determined by X-ray crystallography,
  that have a similar resolution ("PDB-resolution") to this entry, ...
* For structures determined by NMR: the subset of structures determined by NMR ...
* For structures determined by EM: the subset of structures determined by EM ...
... deposited up to the date included in the pdbx_vrpt_software version and
where the percent_rotamer_outliers was successfully calculated.
Example:            Only calculated if percent_rotamer_outliers is available.
N.B. this is the chain/model equivalent of the overall (all chain) category "relative-percentile-percent-rota-outliers"
Produced by the percentiles step of the validation pipeline software.

auth_asym_id.description: Author instance identifier for this container.

auth_seq_id.description: Residue number for non-polymer entity instance.

comp_id.description: Component identifier for non-polymer entity instance.

entity_type.description: Defines the type of the entity.

datablock_name.description: Source data block containing the loaded data set

locator.description: Locator of file containing loaded data

assignment_version.description: Identifies the version of the feature assignment.

asym_id.description: Identifier for the polymer entity instance.

auth_asym_id.description: Identifier for the polymer entity instance.

provenance_code.description:
Code identifying the individual, organization or program that
 assigned the feature.

reference_scheme.description: Code residue coordinate system for the assigned feature.

type.description: A type or category of the feature.

depth.description: Members of the feature class lineage as parent lineage depth (1-N)

id.description: Members of the feature class lineage as parent class identifiers.

name.description: Members of the feature class lineage as parent class names.

beg_seq_id.description: An identifier for the monomer at which this segment of the feature begins.

end_seq_id.description: An identifier for the monomer at which this segment of the feature ends.

comp_id.description: An identifier for the monomer(s) corresponding to the feature assignment.

seq_id.description: An identifier for the monomer at which this segment of the feature ends.

asym_id.description: Identifier for the polymer entity instance.

auth_asym_id.description: Identifier for the polymer entity instance.

coverage.description: The fractional feature coverage relative to the full entity sequence.

type.description: Type or category of the feature.

asym_id.description: Identifier for the polymer entity instance.

auth_asym_id.description: Identifier for the polymer entity instance.

enum: covalent modification of a nucleotide base
covalent modification of a nucleotide phosphate
covalent modification of a nucleotide sugar

description.description: A description of special details of the connection.

id.description:
The value of _rcsb_struct_conn.id is an identifier for connection.

 Note that this item need not be a number; it can be any unique
 identifier.

ordinal_id.description:
The value of _rcsb_struct_conn.id must uniquely identify a record in
 the rcsb_struct_conn list.

value_order.description:
The chemical bond order associated with the specified atoms in
 this contact.

auth_asym_id.description:
A component of the identifier for the target of the structure
 connection.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.auth_asym_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

auth_seq_id.description:
A component of the identifier for the target of the structure
 connection.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.auth_seq_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

label_alt_id.description:
A component of the identifier for the target of the structure
 connection.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_alt_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

label_asym_id.description:
A component of the identifier for the target of the structure
 connection.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_asym_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

label_atom_id.description:
A component of the identifier for the target of the structure
 connection.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_atom_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

label_comp_id.description:
A component of the identifier for the target of the structure
 connection.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_comp_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

label_seq_id.description:
A component of the identifier for the target of the structure
 connection.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.connect_target_label_seq_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

symmetry.description:
Describes the symmetry operation that should be applied to the
 atom set specified by _rcsb_struct_conn.label* to generate the
 target of the structure connection.

label_alt_id.description:
A component of the identifier for the partner in the structure
 connection.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_alt_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

label_asym_id.description:
A component of the identifier for the partner in the structure
 connection.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_asym_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

label_atom_id.description:
A component of the identifier for the partner in the structure
 connection.

 This data item is a pointer to _chem_comp_atom.atom_id in the
 CHEM_COMP_ATOM category.

label_comp_id.description:
A component of the identifier for the partner in the structure
 connection.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_comp_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

label_seq_id.description:
A component of the identifier for the partner in the structure
 connection.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_seq_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

symmetry.description:
Describes the symmetry operation that should be applied to the
 atom set specified by _rcsb_struct_conn.connect_partner_label* to generate the
 partner in the structure connection.

entity_id.description: This data item is a pointer to _entity.id in the ENTITY category.

id.description:
The value of _struct_asym.id must uniquely identify a record in
 the STRUCT_ASYM list.

 Note that this item need not be a number; it can be any unique
 identifier.

pdbx_blank_PDB_chainid_flag.description:
A flag indicating that this entity was originally labeled
 with a blank PDB chain id.

pdbx_modified.description: This data item indicates whether the structural elements are modified.

auth_asym_id.description:
A component of the identifier for the monomer.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.auth_asym_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

auth_comp_id.description:
A component of the identifier for the monomer.

title: schema: pdbx_core collection: pdbx_core_entity_instance version: 6.0.1
description: RCSB Exchange Database JSON schema derived from the pdbx_core content type schema. This schema supports collection pdbx_core_entity_instance version 6.0.1. This schema is hosted in repository https://github.com/rcsb/py-rcsb.db/tree/master/rcsb.db/data/json-schema/json-schema-min-pdbx_core_entity_instance.json and follows JSON schema specification version 4
